fields.fieldText:
Hi [enter name here] - I’m [Your Name] from Bunker. We are the insurance broker for one of your contractors, [Enter Contractor Name here]. They shared their certificate of insurance with you through our platform - so you should have received an email to view their digital certificate and specific insurance details.
I wanted to reach out and introduce myself, and ask if you had questions regarding the certificate or coverage details for your contractor.
Did you receive the email to the Bunker platform with the contractors Live insurance certificate? Did you have any questions about the Live certificate or the contractors coverage? Did you know that you can use Bunker’s system for free to manage all of your certificates of insurance?
